definition: to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: I just get my parole, and do not want to be your scapegoat somehow.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚刚假释耶，不想莫名其妙的变成你的代罪羔羊。

sentences.english: Then he was notified that the shooter was up for his parole hearing.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他被告知将会为那个杀人犯举行假释听证会。

sentences.english: That fixed up any chance of parole I might have, for a long, long time.
sentences.chinese: 这就在一段很长很长的时间内封死了我假释的机会。

sentences.english: Amazingly he was granted parole because sufficient doubt remained about his innocence.
sentences.chinese: 戏剧性的是他被准予假释，因为许多人相信他的清白。

sentences.english: He was paroled six months ago.
Parole is a form of conditional release form prison granted before the date when a prisoner is ordinarily due for release.
sentences.chinese: 假释是罪犯刑满释放前附条件释放的一种制度。

sentences.english: You're sitting on life without paroles.
Parole revocation is one of the punishments on a parolee who fails to abide by the conditions of parole.
sentences.chinese: 撤销假释是对假释犯不遵守假释条件的惩罚方式之一。

sentences.english: Parole revocation is one of the punishments on a parolee who fails to abide by the conditions of parole.
sentences.chinese: 撤销假释是对假释犯不遵守假释条件的惩罚方式之一。

sentences.english: Parole revocation is one of the punishments on a parolee who fails to abide by the conditions of parole.
sentences.chinese: 撤销假释是对假释犯不遵守假释条件的惩罚方式之一。

sentences.english: Do you know that he was on parole?
sentences.chinese: 你知道他还在假释期间吗？

sentences.english: Of course, there is never an iron clad guarantee that a paroled killer will never kill again.
sentences.chinese: 当然，没有铁证可以确定假释期的犯人不会继续杀人。

sentences.english: A pris oner on parole is put under oath to return to custody by a certain date.
sentences.chinese: 获得假释的犯人必须保证如期返回监狱。
跨国携带枪支，违反假释。

sentences.english: If convicted, he faces life in prison with no chance of parole.
sentences.chinese: 如果罪名成立，他将面临无假释机会的终身监禁。

definition: to reduce penalty/shortened or commuted (judicial) sentence
to release for medical treatment (of a prisoner)
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
